title: 195: Train Like Bruce Lee
description: Old time strongmen and bodybuilders did it, Bruce Lee did it, but today, most muscle builders have completely forgotten about this strength and performance tool that builds up the central nervous system and leads to rock hard muscle. Sal, Adam & Justin reveal and break down how to use this tool in this episode.
